name: Drill-Man
description:
Name - Drill-Man.

Platform - Android/Browser/IOS.

Genre - Hyper Casual.

Art Style -  Black & White.

Control : Tap & Hold to drill to break and climb down. (Space bar for windows). 

Game-Play :

1.   Beat your own timing  every  time .

2.  Break the black Tiles when player  is white  and  vice versa.

3.  Tap and hold, help player to drill faster  to come down when in air.

4.  Once you completed  all 5 levels you can play all 5 levels whenever you want.
